alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:26AM CDT until July 24 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CRAWFORD COUNTY... At 1226 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Harpers Ferry to 10 miles northwest of Boscobel to 11 miles east of Prairie Du Chien, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Prairie Du Chien, Seneca, Wauzeka, Eastman, Mount Sterling, Ferryville, Lynxville, Steuben, Highway 27 And County F, Harris Ridge, Rising Sun, Limery Ridge, Fairview, Joy Hollow, Hazen Corners, Kickapoo Indian Caverns, Lock And Dam 9, Oak Ridge and Crowley Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
